description.zh-cn: 韩国政治家与人权律师，曾任大韩民国第19任总统。
description.en: South Korean politician and human rights lawyer who served as the 19th president of South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，文在寅的挚友及政治伙伴，曾与文在寅共同开设律师事务所。
description.en: Former President of South Korea, a close friend and political partner of Moon Jae-in, with whom he co-founded a law firm.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的一所私立大学。
description.en: A private university in South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅的妻子，韩国前第一夫人。
description.en: Wife of Moon Jae-in, former First Lady of South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅的儿子。
description.en: Son of Moon Jae-in.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Moon Jae-in.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的国家元首和政府首脑。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，朴正熙之女，文在寅的政治对手。
description.en: Former President of South Korea, daughter of Park Chung-hee, and a political rival of Moon Jae-in.

description.zh-cn: 韩国现任总统，文在寅的继任者。
description.en: The current President of South Korea, successor to Moon Jae-in.

en: National Assembly of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的最高立法机关。
description.en: The unicameral national legislature of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的主要自由派政党。
description.en: A major liberal political party in South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 共同民主党的前身之一。
description.en: A predecessor to the Democratic Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，军事独裁者。
description.en: Former President of South Korea, a military dictator.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国国军的陆上武装部队。
description.en: The army of South Korea, responsible for ground-based warfare.

nodes.id: 大韩民国第1空降特战旅

zh-cn: 大韩民国第1空降特战旅

description.zh-cn: 韩国陆军特战司令部下属的特种部队。
description.en: A special forces unit of the Republic of Korea Army Special Warfare Command.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，军事独裁者，曾是文在寅服役时的旅长。
description.en: Former President of South Korea, a military dictator, who was Moon Jae-in's brigade commander during his military service.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，曾任国家安全企划部部长，是文在寅服役时的营长。
description.en: South Korean politician, former head of the Agency for National Security Planning, who was Moon Jae-in's battalion commander during his military service.

description.zh-cn: 1976年在板门店共同警备区发生的军事冲突事件。
description.en: A military conflict that occurred in the Joint Security Area at Panmunjom in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 1981年全斗焕军事独裁政府镇压釜山地区的社会科学读书聚会，并将其定义为“共产主义运动”的事件。
description.en: An incident in 1981 where the Chun Doo-hwan military government suppressed social science reading groups in Busan, labeling them as communist movements.

zh-cn: 中韩远洋渔轮仇杀事件

description.zh-cn: 1996年发生在韩国远洋渔船佩斯卡玛号上的一起海上仇杀事件。
description.en: A murder incident that occurred aboard the South Korean fishing vessel Pescamar No. 15 in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的一个保守派政党，是国民力量的前身。
description.en: A conservative political party in South Korea, a predecessor to the People Power Party.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国现任最高领导人。
description.en: The current supreme leader of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅与金正恩在板门店举行的首脑会晤。
description.en: A summit meeting between Moon Jae-in and Kim Jong Un held at Panmunjom.

description.zh-cn: 美国第45任总统。
description.en: The 45th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 韩国庆尚南道下辖的一个市。
description.en: A city in South Gyeongsang Province, South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅担任韩国总统期间的韩国政府。
description.en: The government of South Korea during the presidency of Moon Jae-in.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，曾任文在寅政府时期的国务总理。
description.en: South Korean politician who served as Prime Minister during the Moon Jae-in government.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，曾任文在寅政府时期的国务总理。
description.en: South Korean politician who served as Prime Minister during the Moon Jae-in government.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，曾任文在寅政府时期的国务总理。
description.en: South Korean politician who served as Prime Minister during the Moon Jae-in government.

description.zh-cn: 韩国保守派政治人物，曾在2017年总统选举电视辩论中与文在寅交锋。
description.en: A conservative South Korean politician who confronted Moon Jae-in in a televised debate during the 2017 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 共同民主党的前身之一。
description.en: A predecessor to the Democratic Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅于1972年考入庆熙大学法学系，并于1980年毕业。
description.en: Moon Jae-in entered the law school of Kyung Hee University in 1972 and graduated in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅自1982年起与卢武铉合作开设律师事务所，成为其一生的挚友和政治伙伴。
description.en: Starting in 1982, Moon Jae-in partnered with Roh Moo-hyun to open a law firm, becoming his lifelong close friend and political partner.

description.zh-cn: 在卢武铉总统任期内，文在寅担任总统秘书室长。
description.en: Moon Jae-in served as Chief Presidential Secretary during President Roh Moo-hyun's term.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅政府是在文在寅总统领导下的韩国行政部门。
description.en: The Moon Jae-in government was the executive branch of South Korea under the leadership of President Moon Jae-in.

description.zh-cn: 李洛渊在文在寅政府担任国务总理。
description.en: Lee Nak-yon served as Prime Minister under the Moon Jae-in government.

description.zh-cn: 丁世均在文在寅政府担任国务总理。
description.en: Chung Sye-kyun served as Prime Minister under the Moon Jae-in government.

description.zh-cn: 金富谦在文在寅政府担任国务总理。
description.en: Kim Boo-kyum served as Prime Minister under the Moon Jae-in government.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅是朴槿惠的主要政治对手，曾在2012年总统选举中败给朴槿惠，后在2017年朴槿惠被弹劾后当选总统。朴槿惠政府曾将文在寅列入政治黑名单。
description.en: Moon Jae-in was a major political rival to Park Geun-hye. He lost to her in the 2012 presidential election but was elected in 2017 after Park's impeachment. Park's government had placed Moon on a political blacklist.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅卸任后参加了继任者尹锡悦的总统就职典礼。
description.en: After leaving office, Moon Jae-in attended the presidential inauguration of his successor, Yoon Suk-yeol.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦就任总统后，韩国检方对文在寅前政府展开了多项调查，被文在寅方面认为是政治报复。
description.en: After Yoon Suk-yeol took office, South Korean prosecutors launched several investigations into the former Moon Jae-in administration, which Moon's side considered political retaliation.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅自2015年起为共同民主党党员，并于2015年至2016年间担任党代表。
description.en: Moon Jae-in has been a member of the Democratic Party since 2015 and served as its leader from 2015 to 2016.

relationships.target: 大韩民国第1空降特战旅

description.zh-cn: 文在寅在韩国陆军特战司令部服役时，全斗焕是其所属的第1空降特战旅的旅长。
description.en: When Moon Jae-in served in the ROK Army Special Warfare Command, Chun Doo-hwan was the commander of his unit, the 1st Special Forces Brigade.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅在韩国陆军特战司令部服役时，张世东是其所属的第3营的营长。
description.en: When Moon Jae-in served in the ROK Army Special Warfare Command, Jang Se-dong was the commander of his unit, the 3rd Battalion.

description.zh-cn: 1975年，文在寅因参与反对时任总统朴正熙的维新宪法抗议活动而被捕入狱。
description.en: In 1975, Moon Jae-in was arrested and imprisoned for participating in protests against the Yushin Constitution of then-President Park Chung-hee.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅在军中服役期间经历了板门店事件。
description.en: Moon Jae-in experienced the Panmunjom Axe Murder Incident during his military service.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅曾与卢武铉合作为釜林事件中被捕的学生提供免费法律辩护。
description.en: Moon Jae-in, along with Roh Moo-hyun, provided free legal defense for the students arrested in the Burim case.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅在佩斯卡玛号事件二审时，无偿为涉案的中国朝鲜族船员提供法律援助。
description.en: During the second trial of the Pescamar No. 15 incident, Moon Jae-in provided pro bono legal assistance to the involved Chinese-Korean crew members.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅与朝鲜最高领导人金正恩在板门店和平之家举行了朝韩首脑会晤。
description.en: Moon Jae-in held an inter-Korean summit with North Korean supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the Peace House in Panmunjom.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅访问白宫并与时任美国总统唐纳·川普会面。
description.en: Moon Jae-in visited the White House and met with then-U.S. President Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 在2017年总统选举的电视辩论中，作为候选人的洪准杓与文在寅就同性恋等议题进行了激烈交锋。
description.en: In a televised debate during the 2017 presidential election, candidate Hong Joon-pyo clashed with Moon Jae-in on issues such as homosexuality.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅曾代表民主统合党参加2012年总统选举。
description.en: Moon Jae-in represented the Democratic United Party in the 2012 presidential election.
